divs: sighting detailsi walked outside and seen a bright object in the sky. it had a very large red light on one side and a large blue light on the other side. the object was flying right to left and ascending and descending. and the lights were flashi ng on and off. when the red and blue lights were off i could see that there was a small white ligjt on the bottom. i watched it for 10 mins. then i seen it h over then the lights\object descended toward the ground. i dont kno if it landed because the houses in front of me blocked my view.
Summary: i walked outside my house and observed a bright object in the north sky. as i am watching it, it is flying west and abruptly flies east. it has a very large red light on one side and a bright blue light on the other side.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Newman
There were no other sightings in Newman on or around February 24th 2013
